SELECT s.schedule_no , s.schedule_writer , s.schedule_start , s.schedule_end , s.schedule_title , s.schedule_location , s.schedule_detail_location , s.schedule_content , s.schedule_auth , s.create_date
, sm.schedule_member_email , sm.schedule_attend
, sc.schedule_cmt_no , sc.cmt_member_email , sc.schedule_cmt_content , sc.cmt_create_date FROM schedule s LEFT OUTER JOIN schedule_member sm ON s.schedule_no = sm.schedule_no LEFT OUTER JOIN schedule_comment sc ON s.schedule_no = sc.schedule_no WHERE s.project_no = #{projectNo} ORDER BY s.schedule_no DESC
